ticket_data.title: Support digest-based upgrades via ClusterCurator for non-recommended upgrades
ticket_data.description:
h2. *Value Statement*

Urgent request by Amadeus to use the image digest for non-recommeneded upgrades as the image tag doesn't work in their disconnected environment.
h2. *Definition of Done for Engineering Story Owner (Checklist)*
 * ...

h3. *Development Complete*
 * The code is complete.
 * Functionality is working.
 * Any required downstream Docker file changes are made.

h3. *Tests Automated*
 * [ ] Unit/function tests have been automated and incorporated into the
build.
 * [ ] 100% automated unit/function test coverage for new or changed APIs.

h3. *Secure Design*
 * [ ] Security has been assessed and incorporated into your threat model.

h3. *Multidisciplinary Teams Readiness*
 * [ ] Create an informative documentation issue using the Customer

Portal Doc template that you can access from [The Playbook](

[https://docs.google.com/document/d/1YTqpZRH54Bnn4WJ2nZmjaCoiRtqmrc2w6DdQxe_yLZ8/edit#heading=h.9fvyr2rdriby]),

and ensure doc acceptance criteria is met.
 * Call out this sentence as it's own action:

 * [ ] Link the development issue to the doc issue.

h3. *Support Readiness*
 * [ ] The must-gather script has been updated.
